AI Description: Voro++ is an open-source software library for the computation of the Voronoi diagram, a partitioning of space into a set of polygons based on the distance to a specified set of points. It provides a variety of algorithms for constructing Voronoi diagrams in both two and three dimensions.
Core Features: Efficient Computation Of Voronoi Diagrams, Support For Both 2D & 3D Spaces, Robust & Accurate Results, Configurable & Customizable Options, Compatible With Various Programming Languages
